abstract: The announcement was a sign that the credit crisis was easing and that officials wanted to curtail some extraordinary rescue efforts.
snippet: The announcement was a sign that the credit crisis was easing and that officials wanted to curtail some extraordinary rescue efforts.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON  The Federal Reserve said Thursday that it would scale back some of its emergency lending programs, a first step toward unwinding its extraordinary effort to fight the financial crisis.

headline.main: Fed Scaling Back Some Emergency Lending Programs
headline.print_headline: Fed Scaling Back Some Emergency Lending Programs
